mapper.select: SELECT C.MENU_ID AS menuId , C.MENU_NAME AS menuName , C.PARENT_MENU_ID AS parentMenuId , C.MENU_URL AS menuUrl , C.SORT_ORDER AS sortOrder , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MENU WHERE PARENT_MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID) AS childCount FROM ( SELECT M.ID AS MENU_ID , MAX(M.MENU_NAME) AS MENU_NAME , MAX(M.PARENT_MENU_ID) AS PARENT_MENU_ID , MAX(M.MENU_URL) AS MENU_URL , MAX(M.SORT_ORDER) AS SORT_ORDER FROM MENU M INNER JOIN MENU_ROLE MR ON M.ID = MR.MENU_ID INNER JOIN USER_ROLE UR ON MR.ROLE_ID = UR.ROLE_ID WHERE M.USAGE_STATUS = true AND UR.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY M.ID ) C ORDER BY C.PARENT_MENU_ID, C.SORT_ORDER, C.MENU_ID
